column4: On an intel celeron 2.4GHz with 1gb ram, intel 82845GL graphics card....Lubuntu or Xubuntu?
whatever you prefer, with those specs you'll be fine for everything but heavy compiz use
and other heavy processing like some compiling and rendering models
how do the following disk benchmark results sound to people? Timing cached reads = 303.76 MB/sec Timing buffered disk reads =  33.23 MB/sec
what are lubuntu or xubuntu come with workspace limits? i.e. will I have multiple workspaces and if so what's the max number allowed?
